title.narrative: Strategy for Strengthening Capacities for the Reactivation of the Traditional Pottery of Simbila-Catacaos

description.narrative: The main objective of this Project is to reactivate the pottery tradition of Simbila after the effect that "El Niño Costero" caused on the potters' livelihoods. To achieve this reactivation, three components will be developed that will benefit the community of Simbila. 1) Socio-emotional Recovery: This component will work on the resilience of the potters from climate disasters that may affect their livelihoods, as well as on the development of skills that allow them to work as a team. 2) Strengthening of Technical Capacities: this component will develop training in management, innovation and access to markets of the art of pottery. 3) Heritage Value Dissemination: In this component, research and audiovisual materials will be carried out that allow valuing the pottery tradition of Simbila.
